trans-unit.source: Provides information about successful authentication events.
trans-unit.target: 提供成功驗證事件的相關資訊

trans-unit.source: ASP.NET health monitoring allows production and operations staff to manage deployed Web applications.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視，可讓管理已部署的 Web 應用程式的生產環境和作業人員。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management> namespace contains the health-event types responsible for packaging application health-status data and the provider types responsible for processing this data.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management>命名空間包含負責封裝應用程式健全狀況狀態資料和負責處理此資料提供者類型的健全狀況事件型別。

trans-unit.source: It also contains supporting types that help during the management of health events.
trans-unit.target: 它也會包含有助於管理健全狀況事件的支援型別。

trans-unit.source: The following list describes the features for which ASP.NET raises events of type <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>.
trans-unit.target: 下列清單說明 ASP.NET，會引發之事件類型的功能<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>。

trans-unit.source: By default ASP.NET is configured to log audit failure conditions only, as logging success conditions can severely strain system resources.
trans-unit.target: 根據預設，ASP.NET 設定記錄稽核失敗狀況唯一，因為記錄成功條件可以嚴重耗用系統資源。

trans-unit.source: You can always configure the system to log the success conditions.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠可以設定系統以記錄成功狀況。

trans-unit.source: Forms Authentication.
trans-unit.target: 表單驗證。

trans-unit.source: Successful conditions are audited.
trans-unit.target: 稽核成功的狀況。

trans-unit.source: Success audits include the user name that was authenticated.
trans-unit.target: 成功稽核會包含已驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Instead, failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from a ticket that failed decryption or validation.
trans-unit.target: 相反地，稽核失敗不會包含使用者名稱，因為它們通常會從無法解密或驗證票證。

trans-unit.source: Both contain the client IP address.
trans-unit.target: 同時包含用戶端 IP 位址。

trans-unit.source: The related event audit code is <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 相關的事件稽核的程式碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditFormsAuthenticationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: Membership.
trans-unit.target: 成員資格。

trans-unit.source: Successful conditions are audited.
trans-unit.target: 稽核成功的狀況。

trans-unit.source: Both success and failure audits contain the username that was attempted.
trans-unit.target: 成功和失敗稽核會包含所嘗試的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: Neither form of audit will contain the password that was attempted, because that would risk persisting a valid password in the log.
trans-unit.target: 兩種稽核形式會包含已嘗試的密碼，因為，會保存記錄檔中的有效密碼的風險。

trans-unit.source: The related event audit code is <xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess>.
trans-unit.target: 相關的事件稽核的程式碼<xref:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.AuditMembershipAuthenticationSuccess>。

trans-unit.source: When a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> is raised, by default it updates the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter.
trans-unit.target: 當<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>引發時，依預設它會更新驗證成功的事件引發的效能計數器。

trans-unit.source: To view this performance counter in System Monitor (PerfMon), in the **Add Counters** window select **ASP.NET** in the **Performance object** drop-down list, select the Authentication Success Events Raised performance counter, and click the **Add** button.
trans-unit.target: 若要檢視在 [系統監視器 (PerfMon)，此效能計數器中**新增計數器**視窗選取**ASP.NET**中**效能物件**下拉式清單中，選取驗證成功的事件引發的效能計數器，然後按一下**新增**] 按鈕。

trans-unit.source: For more information, see [Using the System Monitor (PerfMon) with ASP.NET Applications](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) on MSDN.
trans-unit.target: 如需詳細資訊，請參閱[ASP.NET 應用程式使用 「 系統監視器 (PerfMon)](http://go.microsoft.com/fwlink/?linkid=36882&clcid=0x409) MSDN 上。

trans-unit.source: In most cases you will be able to use the ASP.NET health-monitoring types as implemented, and you will control the health-monitoring system by specifying values in the `healthMonitoring` configuration section.
trans-unit.target: 在大部分情況下您將能夠實作時，使用 ASP.NET 健康監視類型，而您會藉由指定的值控制健全狀況監視系統`healthMonitoring`組態區段。

trans-unit.source: You can also derive from the health-monitoring types to create your own custom events and providers.
trans-unit.target: 您也可以衍生自健全狀況監視類型的類型來建立您自己的自訂事件和提供者。

trans-unit.source: For an example of deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent> class, see the example provided in this topic.
trans-unit.target: 如需範例衍生自<xref:System.Web.Management.WebBaseEvent>類別，請參閱本主題中所提供的範例。

trans-unit.source: This code example has two parts: a configuration-file excerpt, followed by code that shows how to customize the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: 這個程式碼範例有兩個部分： 組態檔摘錄，後面接著程式碼，說明如何自訂<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>事件。

trans-unit.source: This following is an excerpt of the configuration file's `provider` and `eventMappings` sections.
trans-unit.target: 以下是組態檔的摘錄`provider`和`eventMappings`區段。

trans-unit.source: They are already set by default.
trans-unit.target: 依預設已設定它們。

trans-unit.source: The only thing you need to do is to provide the setup for the `rules` element in the `healthMonitoring` section.
trans-unit.target: 唯一要做為提供的安裝程式`rules`中的項目`healthMonitoring`> 一節。

trans-unit.source: The following code shows how to customize the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> event.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼示範如何自訂<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>事件。

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent" /> class.
trans-unit.target: 初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent" /> 類別的新執行個體。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件描述。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 做為事件來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件關聯的代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您實作自訂事件時，事件代碼必須大於 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The name of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的參數來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to instantiate a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不會使用它來具現化<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor when deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會衍生自<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to customize this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: The event description.
trans-unit.target: 事件描述。

trans-unit.source: The object that is the source of the event.
trans-unit.target: 做為事件來源的物件。

trans-unit.source: The code associated with the event.
trans-unit.target: 與事件關聯的代碼。

trans-unit.source: When you implement a custom event, the event code must be greater than <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />.
trans-unit.target: 當您實作自訂事件時，事件代碼必須大於 <see cref="F:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes.WebExtendedBase" />。

trans-unit.source: The <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> value that specifies the detailed identifier for the event.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebEventCodes" /> 值，指定事件的詳細資料識別項。

trans-unit.source: The name of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Initializes the <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent" /> class using the supplied parameters.
trans-unit.target: 使用提供的參數來初始化 <see cref="T:System.Web.Management.WebSuccessAuditEvent" /> 類別。

trans-unit.source: This constructor is used internally by the ASP.NET health-monitoring system.
trans-unit.target: ASP.NET 健康監視系統會在內部使用這個建構函式。

trans-unit.source: You will never use it to instantiate a <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> object, but you can call this constructor when implementing your own event type that inherits from this class.
trans-unit.target: 您永遠不會使用它來具現化<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>物件，但是您可以呼叫這個建構函式實作您自己這個類別會繼承的事件類型時。

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor is not intended to be used directly from your code.
trans-unit.target: <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A>建構函式不適合直接從您的程式碼使用。

trans-unit.source: It is called by ASP.NET.
trans-unit.target: 它是由 ASP.NET 呼叫。

trans-unit.source: You can call the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A> constructor when deriving from the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent> class.
trans-unit.target: 您可以呼叫<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.%23ctor%2A>建構函式會衍生自<xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent>類別。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to customize this constructor.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何自訂此建構函式。

trans-unit.source: Gets the name of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 取得已驗證使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: The name of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 已驗證使用者的名稱。

trans-unit.source: Only the success audits include the name of the authenticated user.
trans-unit.target: 成功稽核會包含已驗證的使用者名稱。

trans-unit.source: The failure audits do not include the user name, since they typically result from failed decryption or validation.
trans-unit.target: 失敗的稽核不包含使用者名稱，因為它們通常是由解密或驗證失敗所造成。

trans-unit.source: The following code example shows how to use the <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.NameToAuthenticate%2A> property.
trans-unit.target: 下列程式碼範例示範如何使用 <xref:System.Web.Management.WebAuthenticationSuccessAuditEvent.NameToAuthenticate%2A> 屬性。
